original: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'dir stong pa nyid du bsgoms pa'i rjes la padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thig le dkar po bsgom par byas nas /

translated: Here, after meditating on emptiness as previously taught, one should meditate on a white drop on a lotus and moon maṇḍala.
